product_name: Swix One Love Performance Ski Poles
long_description: Designed for recreational skiing, freeride and jibbing, the Swix One Love poles offer bright Rasta-inspired graphics with easy-to grip handles and sturdy construction. Stout aluminum supplies high-impact strength and stiff flex for good thrust. Shaft diameter measures 18mm at the handle and 10mm at the basket. Adjustable straps; grip fits well in hands. Swix One Love poles include powder baskets and smaller baskets for groomed runs.
short_description: Designed for recreational skiing, freeride and jibbing, the Swix One Love poles offer bright Rasta-inspired graphics with easy-to grip handles and sturdy construction.
